instruction: Convert the following document into a list of five bullet points.
input: Sports play a key role in the lives of many people. It can teach young people about leadership and teamwork, as well as important values like perseverance and camaraderie. Sporting events bring communities together and also provide an opportunity for people to come and support their favourite teams or players.
output:
- Sports can teach young people about leadership and teamwork
- Sports can teach important values like perseverance and camaraderie
- Sporting events bring communities together 
- People can come and support their favorite teams or players
- Sports play a key role in the lives of many people
